# About this Book {-}

This is a textbook for my advanced statistics course, first used in Fall 2021.

It is a remix of existing open source educational materials. The primary source of content is Danielle Navarroâ€™s textbook (2018).

## Attribution

Where authors are indicated throughout this text, the content has been copied verbatim with no more than minor editorial changes. Sources include:

Navarro, D. (2018). Learning statistics with R: A tutorial for psychology students and other beginners (version 0.6). Retrieved from https://compcogscisydney.org/learning-statistics-with-r/

Crump, M. J. C., Navarro, D., & Suzuki, J. (2019, June 5). Answering Questions with Data (Textbook): Introductory Statistics for Psychology Students. https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/JZE52
